title: Sustainable Single-Use Alternatives - the Plastic Straw Edition - UrthPact
body: Paper straws have often been labeled as the end-all be-all solution to the plastic straw problem. And while many businesses have swapped to paper straws, the result hasn't exactly been as expected. While falling in the same cost frame as PHA's and PLA's, the end of life for paper straws is much more blurry than many would think. Paper is often claimed to be "inherently compostable ...
